hypothesis_content.title: Stress-to-Bull Regime Transition via Volatility Compression
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market transitions from STRESS to BULL regime, a 3-day compression of BTC 30-day realized volatility below 40% while price holds above the 50-day moving average predicts a mean-reversion bounce of +15% within 10 trading days with 70% accuracy.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Stress regimes often end not with capitulation but with volatility compression as fear dissipates. The combination of regime shift signal plus technical confirmation (price above MA, moderate RSI) filters false transitions. Historical analysis shows 2019, 2020, and 2023 stress exits followed this pattern.
entry_conditions: Regime shifts from STRESS to BULL (confirmed by FjordHQ regime classifier)
BTC 30-day realized volatility < 40% for 3 consecutive days
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If 5 consecutive regime transitions show <50% success rate for +15% target within 10 days, or if average win/loss ratio falls below 1.5:1.
